OrgName.entry: INTEGRATED PRACTICE AND INCLUSIVE PROVISION TEAM

AltName.entry: SERVICE FOR DEAF AND HEARING IMPAIRED CHILDREN, AND EARLY YEARS INCLUSION SCHEME

Desc.entry: The Integrated Practice and Inclusive Provision team has two main parts. The Service for Deaf and Hearing Impaired Children and the Early Years Inclusion team. It also includes the Sheffield Early Years Language Centre which provides a therapeutic nursery placement for children with language and communication problems.

Langs.entry: British Sign Language, Polish, Punjabi, Slovakian, Urdu

ContactName.entry: Ms Tina Wakefield, Manager Integrated Practice & Inclusive Provision

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 8am-5pm, Fri 8am-4.30pm during school term. Home visits to families by arrangement. Home visits to pre-school hearing impaired children and the Portage Scheme continue through school holidays
